SEARCH
Package lab6

Class HotelReservationSystem

java.lang.Object
lab6.HotelReservationSystem
public class HotelReservationSystem extends Object
Represents a hotel room booking with guest information, dates, and associated room. This class demonstrates association (has-a relationship) with the Room class and includes comprehensive validation with exception handling.

  • Constructor Details

    • HotelReservationSystem

      public HotelReservationSystem(String bookingID, String guestName, Date checkInDate, Date checkOutDate, int numberOfGuests, lab6.Room room) throws lab6.InvalidBookingException, lab6.RoomCapacityExceededException
      Parameterized constructor that creates a booking with specified values. Validates all input parameters and throws appropriate exceptions for invalid data.
      Parameters:
      bookingID - the unique booking identifier (must not be null or empty)
      guestName - the name of the guest (must not be null or empty)
      checkInDate - the check-in date (must not be null)
      checkOutDate - the check-out date (must be after check-in date)
      numberOfGuests - the number of guests (must be positive and within room capacity)
      room - the associated room (must not be null)
      Throws:
      lab6.InvalidBookingException - if any parameter is invalid
      lab6.RoomCapacityExceededException - if numberOfGuests exceeds room capacity

      Sets the number of guests with validation.
      Parameters:

      Throws:
      lab6.InvalidBookingException - if numberOfGuests is less than or equal to 0
      lab6.RoomCapacityExceededException - if numberOfGuests exceeds room capacity

      public double getTotalCost()

      Returns:
      the total cost rounded to 2 decimal places

    • getTotalCostWithTax

      public double getTotalCostWithTax(double taxRate)
      Calculates the total cost of the booking including tax.
      Parameters:
      taxRate - the tax rate as a percentage (e.g., 13.0 for 13%)
      Returns:
      the total cost including tax, rounded to 2 decimal places

      public double getDiscountedTotal(double discountPercent)
      Calculates the discounted total cost. Uses the associated room's applyDiscount method.
      Parameters:
      discountPercent - the discount percentage (e.g., 10.0 for 10% off)
      Returns:
      the discounted total cost rounded to 2 decimal places

    • isWeekendBooking

      public boolean isWeekendBooking()
      Checks if the check-in date falls on a weekend (Friday or Saturday).
      Returns:
      true if check-in is on Friday or Saturday, false otherwise
